entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Capture original exception in DeveloperExceptionPage middleware #47658
  • Add exception property to the problem details context #47651
  • Provide out of the box Identity Manager UI #47648
  • `HttpProtocol.ConnectProtocol` is not being reset between unrelated requests #47647
  • Make successful authentication scheme available from HttpContext object #47646
  • [Blazor] Intercept navigation from inside iframe #47645
    Backlog
  • WithOpenApi adds Empty requestBody when parameter is of type string[] or StringValues #47644
    8.0-preview4
  • GetApplicationPartManager uses environment variable ApplicationName to get entryAssemblyName is that the expected behavior? If we override ApplicationName, app crashes #47643
  • Extending TypedResults static class functionality #47642
  • [Blazor] Define blazor.webassembly.Js as a static web asset #47640
    .NET 8 Planning
  • I configure the server to requiere client certificate but it accepts the request when client doesn't add a certificate #47638

Closed

  • Auto revolve open-api docs from JsonHttpResult<TValue> type #47630
  • Add Documentation for ASP.NET+AOT #47486
    8.0-preview3
  • ApiConventionNameMatch doesn't work as expected #47120
  • Question about Microsoft.AspNetCore nuget versions #47612
  • IExceptionHandlerFeature is not available in CustomizeProblemDetails when using UseDeveloperExceptionPage #47060
  • Remove HardCoded string in Identity EF Tables Name #47615
  • Review whitespace handling for server-side rendered Blazor components #47609
  • InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Services.WebViewNavigationManager' to type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Routing.IHostEnvironmentNavigationManager'. #47613
  • AMP-HTML #47614
  • How to setup Blazor custom elements in a WordPress website #46516
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47659
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime
  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #47655
    area-infrastructure
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #47652
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Specialize pipeline for MapRazorComponents #47649
    area-blazor
  • Update README.md #47641
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47639
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #47653
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.6
  • Set exception handler feature in developer exception page #47554
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Use WaitHandle in Kestrel heartbeat to quickly exit thread on stop #47619
    area-runtime
  • Return 400 bad request when IOException is thrown when ready form. #47584
    area-runtime
  • Skip dotnet-install #40551
    area-infrastructure
  • WithOpenApi generates annotations for endpoints without MethodInfo #47346
    area-web-frameworks
